requirements.summary: Remove Collection field from the Admin upload form while still applying an internal default collection value on submit.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Upload form no longer renders a "Collection" label/control anywhere on the Admin page.
Submitting the Admin Upload form still succeeds and creates a valid catalog item (no runtime/type errors).
A safe default collection value is applied internally (not shown in UI) so existing catalog data shape continues to work.

file_operations.description: Remove the user-facing Collection Label/Select from the form UI (currently using shadcn-ui Select). Keep the catalog item shape intact by applying a safe internal default collection value during submission (without rendering it). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the Admin add-item handler continues to receive a valid collection value from the upload form after the Collection UI is removed (type-safety / runtime safety only; no behavior changes beyond defaulting).

requirements.summary: Remove the Collection column from the Admin catalog table while keeping actions and responsive layout usable.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin catalog table header and rows no longer include a "Collection" column/cells.
The table layout remains usable on mobile/desktop and Actions still work (Remove, etc.).

file_operations.description: Update the shadcn-ui Table rendering to remove the Collection header and the per-row Collection cell while preserving the Actions column and horizontal scrolling behavior for mobile. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Remove any remaining visible 'Collection' wording from Admin UI text after the Collection UI is removed.
acceptanceCriteria: No Admin-page labels, headings, helper text, or table headers contain the word "Collection".
All remaining Admin UI text is English-only and still reads clearly.

file_operations.description: Update centralized Admin UI text so no Admin-facing strings include the word "Collection" (e.g., remove/rename the admin form collection label text now that the UI is removed), while keeping remaining Admin text clear and English-only.
Ensure no hardcoded Admin table headers/cell labels include the word "Collection" after the column removal. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
